thread.title: BRIEF-Community Bank System Says Joseph Sutaris Promoted to CFO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Community Bank System Says Joseph Sutaris Promoted to CFO

organizations.name: brief-community bank system says joseph sutaris promoted

text:
May 21 (Reuters) - Community Bank System Inc:
* COMMUNITY BANK SYSTEM, INC. ANNOUNCES SENIOR MANAGEMENT CHANGES
* COMMUNITY BANK SYSTEM INC - JOSEPH SUTARIS HAS BEEN PROMOTED TO EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT AND CFO OF COMPANY AND BANK, SUCCEEDING SCOTT KINGSLEY
* COMMUNITY BANK SYSTEM INC - SUTARIS IS CURRENTLY SERVING AS BANKâ€™S SENIOR VICE PRESIDENT, FINANCE AND ACCOUNTING
* COMMUNITY BANK SYSTEM INC - SCOTT KINGSLEY HAS BEEN PROMOTED TO EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT AND COO EFFECTIVE JUNE 1, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
